Vyre noble legs are a piece of a vyre noble disguise that has been scented with the blood of Damien Leucurte, a vyre noble.

Initially obtained by killing Damien Leucurte during Sins of the Father, it can be reclaimed from the chest in the Myreque Hideout under Old Man Ral's house.

[[File:Vyre noble legs detail.png|left|110px]]
'''Vyre noble legs''' are a piece of a vyre noble disguise that has been scented with the blood of [[Damien Leucurte]], a vyre noble.

Initially obtained by killing Damien Leucurte during [[Sins of the Father]], it can be reclaimed from the chest in the [[Myreque Hideout]] under [[Old Man Ral|Old Man Ral's]] house.
